pkgmetadata.longdescription: # monashspamonashspa is a Python library containing helpful Python functions and utilities for Physics & Astronomy classes at Monash University.## DocumentationDocumentation, along with installation instructions, are available at [http://monashspa.readthedocs.io/](http://monashspa.readthedocs.io/)## Licencemonashspa is licensed under the GPLv3 licence.## ContributingPlease see [contributing.md](https://github.com/Monash-University-Physics-Astronomy/monashspa/blob/master/contributing.md). For making a subsequent releasesee [release.md](https://github.com/Monash-University-Physics-Astronomy/monashspa/blob/master/release.md)
